overview: Where is all the fun hiding? In a Bucketful of Cartoons that’s where. Come join Singa Home Entertainment as they bring some of the most beloved color classic’s to you and your family. Featuring: The Dog Show Off, A Self-Made Mongrel, Base Brawl, Fresh Vegetable Mystery, Little Lambskins, A Kick In Time, The Barnyard Brat, Hunky and Spunky In Always Kickin', Snubbed By A Snob, You Cant Shoe A Horsefly, Hunky And Spunky.
title: A Bucket Full of Cartoons
